post.text: Thank you Dana White - - there is no question that I will FIGHT for this COUNTRY! I want to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN - with every American!

comment.author: Holly
comment.text: Let's hope so, or we're all screwed from everything Obama has done, and Hillary will do. Their legacey of destroying this great country! Go Trump!!!

replies.author: Ian
replies.text: Are you out of your mind, or just really that uninformed?

replies.author: Jared
replies.text: Holly . Have you actually looked into the factual data about our countries unemployment rate and economy in general since Obama has been in office ? Look beyond your own personal situation please .

replies.author: Holly
replies.text: Ian, you are surely a dem. because for some reason the country just does not mean anything to SOME of them anymore. It is a sad time when the hell that is going on around us just does not matter. Yes, I'm with Trump. Out of my mind? Well just completely fed up in the pesident and Hillary Clinton! That is a good thing, by the way. I have values, and love my country. It is not a doormat to be walked on. I am very informed. I make sure each day that I am. It is Trump that is honest and Hillary that is corrupt. What more proof does the nation need on her lies!
